v2.5.3 - Changelog
Changed --- - Updated the Quest and Special button image assets. - Added a delay when waiting for the Home screen to appear. - Removed number of tries when searching for the Quest button. - Fleshed out scales in general and clarified 1080p eligibility.
Fixed --- - Fixed infinite loop when matching multiple images when Debug Mode is turned off. - Fixed bug where scales were empty due to not deep copying. - Fixed 720p support.
